entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tasiujaq Airport 03:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure: 99.2 kPa
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: E 47 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing early this evening. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
